creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
description: Fringe with warp-twined (LM) heading, No backing cloth. Black twill-woven wool ground with wool, silk, and synthetic? embroidery. There is a wool fringe. No backing is present. Reverse exposes stitching. Applied, narrow edging all four sides. Ground cloth has vertical, center seam. 09-26-2005 fibers tested ,microscope analysis:wool,silk .No synthetic. Christine Lien
medium: Wool, silk; blanket, needle chain stitch, continuous-thread couching, spaced buttonhole-filling stitch, outline stitch
title: Ilgich
